General.Name: Hudson Investment Group Ltd
General.Description: Hudson Investment Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment and development of properties in Australia. It owns and develops industrial, residential, and commercial properties. The company was incorporated in 1967 and is based in Sydney, Australia.
